tags.name: simple-login
tags.description:
`simple-login`

Events:

  * `simple-login-login` - 

Attributes:

  * `title` - Title of the loginscreen

  * `subtitle` - Subtitle of the loginscreen

  * `errorMsg` - Error message to show (example : "Invalid username")

  * `password` {`string`} - Content of the password field

  * `username` {`string`} - Content of the username field

  * `loading` {`boolean`} - When true, all fields are disabled and the progress bar is visible

  * `user-input-label` {`string`} - Placeholder of the username field

  * `userInputErrMsg` {`string`} - Error message of the username field

  * `password-input-label` {`string`} - Placeholder of the password field

  * `passwordInputErrMsg` {`string`} - Error message of the password field

  * `login-btn-text` {`string`} - Login button label

Properties:

  * `title` - Title of the loginscreen

  * `subtitle` - Subtitle of the loginscreen

  * `errorMsg` - Error message to show (example : "Invalid username")

  * `password` {`string`} - Content of the password field

  * `username` {`string`} - Content of the username field

  * `loading` {`boolean`} - When true, all fields are disabled and the progress bar is visible

  * `userInputLabel` {`string`} - Placeholder of the username field

  * `userInputErrMsg` {`string`} - Error message of the username field

  * `passwordInputLabel` {`string`} - Placeholder of the password field

  * `passwordInputErrMsg` {`string`} - Error message of the password field

  * `loginBtnText` {`string`} - Login button label
